source_objects.title: Creativity
source_objects.description: From idea generation to creative confidence, the power of the subconcious to innovation and invention, come discover methods of creativity.

items.title: Arts Therapy: A Student's Perspective on Art Therapy
items.headline: Art Therapy : A Student's Perspective on "Arts Therapy For Self Healing (Part One)"
objectives_summary: Explore facets of your personality you never knew existed
Use art as a means of self expression
Create art without judgement

items.title: Creative writing: How to write poetry

visible_instructors.title: Serena Greenslade F.V.C.M. (Hons), A.N.E.A.
visible_instructors.name: Serena
visible_instructors.job_title: Elocution coach AKA Voice coach F.V.C.M.(Hons) for 27 years

items.headline: Improve your creative writing and learn how to write sonnets, narrative poetry, blank verse, free verse and much more.
objectives_summary: You will know how to use words to express yourself
You'll be able to create a poem full of meaning
You will be able to use creative writing as a means of relaxation

items.title: 30 Ways to Become an Empowered Artist
items.headline: How to Thrive as a Musician, Writer, Visual Artist, or Other Creative Entrepreneur
objectives_summary: Know the fundamental steps to building a thriving career in the arts
Feel more empowered and confident about the value they bring to the world as an artist
Make the transition from hobbiest to Creative Pro

items.title: Creative Non-Fiction Writing - You Can't Make This Stuff Up!

visible_instructors.title: Trace Crawford
visible_instructors.name: Trace
visible_instructors.job_title: Instructor / Writer / Teacher for over 20 years

items.headline: Learn the skills writers need to write great true crime, memoir, travel, food, journalism, blogs, essays, books and more
objectives_summary: This is a fun and practical writing course designed to get you excited about creating your own creative non-fiction!
The secrets of good storytelling to apply to all types of writing, including memoir, true crime, or even a blog!
A series of authentic writing projects designed to target the skills you need.

items.title: Ten Story High: Learning the Art of Storytelling Made Easy
items.headline: Your stories matter! Learn how to craft your own personal stories in this easy-to-follow storytelling masterclass.
objectives_summary: Successfully learn the aspects of a great story
Unlock the power of personal storytelling
Improve your natural storytelling ability

items.title: Digital Journalism 101 : get published in online media

visible_instructors.title: Damien Walter
visible_instructors.name: Damien
visible_instructors.job_title: Writer for The Guardian, BBC, Wired.

items.headline: Essential writing skills for creative and professional writers.
objectives_summary: Know how to pitch & publish to High Authority publications.

items.title: Writing Interactive Stories for Video Games & Other Formats
items.headline: The Art & Craft of Interactive Fiction
objectives_summary: Writing Interactive Stories for Video Games & Other Formats. The student will be able to write a video-game type story interactive story script at the end of this course.  Create a script for an interactive story, such as a video game.

items.title: Alcohol Ink and Resin DIY Projects Drink Coasters and Knobs!
items.headline: 3 Super Fun QUICK DIY Projects using Alcohol Ink Art and Resin to Create SUPER COOL Unique Art Drink Coasters and knobs!
objectives_summary: This course is for all levels of Alcohol Ink painters or crafty/creative folks looking to create!
This course is about learning to play with colors and freeing up your expectations.
This is a basic short and simple course filled with 3 demos on how create Alcohol Ink Resin Coasters and DIY knobs.

items.title: Screenwriting Masterclass: A Complete Guide to Screenwriting
items.headline: You'll master the entire scriptwriting process & come away knowing how to turn your idea into a great screenplay
objectives_summary: Come away from this course with the knowledge to craft a polished screenplay
Learn the entire screenwriting process from idea to putting it down on 'paper'
How to find great screenwriting ideas

items.title: How to Write Cozy Mysteries

visible_instructors.title: Harry Dewulf
visible_instructors.name: Harry
visible_instructors.job_title: Literary Editor and Story Development Expert.

items.headline: Mystery writing requires compelling mysteries. A light, gentle touch is the best way to reveal the darkness beneath.
objectives_summary: You'll be able to design your own cozy mystery. Writing it is up to you!

items.title: Traveler's Sketchbook: Beginners Guide to Sketching
items.headline: Sketching made easy through Contour Lines and Proportional Drawing Techniques.  Part 1 of a 4 part series of classes!
objectives_summary: Contour line drawing and proportional drawing - the foundational skills for sketching.
How to draw simple and complex objects indoors.
How to draw simple and complex objects outdoors.

items.title: Beginning Playwriting - Write a Play and Get Produced!

visible_instructors.title: Trace Crawford
visible_instructors.name: Trace
visible_instructors.job_title: Instructor / Writer / Teacher for over 20 years

items.headline: Improve dialogue, characterization, conflict, and plot to write your first script and become a successful playwright
objectives_summary: How to think in and write engaging dialogue
The playwriting terminology you absolutely need to know
How to correctly format your playscripts

items.title: Traveler's Sketchbook 2: Drawing Landscapes
items.headline: How to create beautiful and successful drawings of the landscape using easy symbols for trees and shrubs.
objectives_summary: Learn how to draw plants, shrubs and trees in the landscape.
Create realistic symbols of landscape material to add to their sketches.
How to use a variety of ink line weight to show depth and highlight objects in sketches.

items.title: 50 Drawings of Creativity: Sketch Exercises For New Ideas

visible_instructors.title: Tatiana Ambrose
visible_instructors.name: Tatiana
visible_instructors.job_title: Grow your creative thinking, writing & dog business skills

items.headline: Drawing exercises for the uninspired. Boost creativity, memory & problem-solving skills with these 50 drawing exercises.
objectives_summary: Complete drawing exercises that inspire creative thinking
Promote flexibility in your creative thinking through sketch repetition
Generate new creative ideas after completing these drawing exercises

items.title: How to Outline Your Romance Novel - Fast!

visible_instructors.title: Nina Harrington
visible_instructors.name: Nina
visible_instructors.job_title: #1 Amazon Bestselling Author, Blogger and Authorpreneur

items.headline: How to Outline Your Romance Fiction when you don't know anything about Story Structure and the whole idea freezes you!
objectives_summary: Outline the opening chapters of a romance novel and pre-plan the Emotional Story Map for the entire novel.
Feel confident that you can complete your romance novel.

items.title: The Craft Behind Cinematic Storytelling
items.headline: - Know the Secrets and Entertain your Audience
objectives_summary: Printable course notes PDF
Lucid video examples for conceptual understanding
Learn all the techniques of Storytelling
